message: Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.List' import. Should be before 'plugily.projects.thebridge.utils.Utils'.
'Enchantment' has incorrect indentation level 6, expected level should be 8.
WhitespaceAround: 'if' is not followed by whitespace. Empty blocks may only be represented as {} when not part of a multi-block statement (4.1.3)
